{{ardayearheader: * [[Melkor]] appears in [[Formenos]] and speaks with [[Fëanor]], but Fëanor sends him away realising that Melkor covets the [[Silmarils]].<ref name="AA">{{AA
* [[Finwë]] sends messengers to [[Manwë]] warning him of what happened at Formenos.<ref name="AA"/>
* [[Oromë]] and [[Tulkas]] set out in pursuit of Melkor, but he had already passed through the [[Calacirya]] and left [[Valinor]].<ref name="AA"/>
* [[Melkor]] meets with [[Ungoliant]] in [[Avathar]] and they begin their plan of the destruction of the [[Two Trees]].<ref name="AA"/>
